Song.title: Jesus Paid It All
Song.copyright: Â© Words: Public Domain Music: 2002 Word Music, LLC (a div. of Word Music Group, Inc.) John Andrew Schreiner Music, Dejamesolo Music

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [ Bbm7 | Ab | Gb2 :||]
Verse 1: I [Db]hear the Savior say, "Your [Dbsus]strength indeed is [Db]small, Child of [Db]weakness watch and pray, Find in [Absus]Me your all in [Db]all."
Chorus: [Db]Jesus paid it [Bbm7]all, [Db/Ab]All to Him I [Absus]owe; [Ab] [Db]Sin had left a [Gbmaj7]crimson stain, He [Db/Ab]washed it [Ab]white as [Db]snow.
Verse 2: Lord [Db]now indeed I find, Thy [Ebm7/Db]power, and Thine [Db]alone Can [Bbm7(4)]change the leper's [Gb2]spots, and [Db/Ab]melt the [Ab7sus]heart of [Db]stone.
Chorus: [Db]Jesus paid it [Bbm9]all, [Db2/Ab]All to Him I [Absus]owe; [Ab] [Bbm]Sin [Ab/C]had [Db2]left a [Gbmaj7]crimson stain, He [Db/Ab]washed it [Ab]white as [Db]snow.
Alt Int: [Gb2 | Ab | Bbm | Bbm2 | Gb2 | Db/F | Gb2 | Db/F | Ebm7 | hold ]snow.
{new_page} Verse 3: For [Db2]nothing good have I Where[Dbsus]by Thy grace to [Db]claim I'll [Ab2]wash my garments [Gb2]white In the [Db/Ab]blood of [Ab]Calvary's [Db]Lamb
Chorus: [Bbm7]Jesus paid it [Gb2]all, [Db/Ab]All to Him I [Absus]owe; [Ab] [Bbm]Sin [Ab/C]had [Db2]left a [Gb2]crimson stain, He [Db/Ab]washed it [Absus]white as [Db]snow.
Alt Int: [Db | Db | Gb2 | Gbmaj7 | Ab | Db | Gb2 | Gbmaj7 | Ab | Db | Gb2 | Gbmaj7 ]snow.
[| Gb2 | Gbmaj7 | Eb/G | Ab | Ab2(sus) Ab | Gb(no3) | hold | Bbm7 | Ab | Gb2 | hold]
Verse 4: And [Db2(no3)]when before the throne, I [Dbsus]stand in Him com[Db]plete "Jesus [Gbmaj9/Db]died my soul to [Gbmaj9/Bb]save," My [Db/Ab]lips shall [Dbsus/Ab]still re[Db]peat.
Chorus: [Ab/C]Jesus [Ab7/C]paid it [Bbm]all, [Db/Ab]All to Him I [Absus]owe; [Ab] [Bbm7]Sin [Ab/C]had [Db2]left a [Gbmaj9]crimson stain, He [Db/Ab]washed it [Ab7sus]white [Ab7]as [Db | Ab/C]snow. [Bbm7]Jesus paid it [Gb2]all, [Db/Ab]All to Him I [Absus]owe; [Ab] [Bbm]Sin [Ab/C]had [Db2]left a [Gbmaj9]crimson stain, He [Db/Ab]washed it [Ab7sus]white as [Db | Dbmaj7/C | Gb | Gb | Bbm7 | Ab | Gb2 | hold]snow.
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i hear the savior say your strength indeed is small child of weakness watch and pray find in me your all in all chorus jesus paid it all all to him i owe sin had left a crimson stain he washed it white as snow verse 2 lord now indeed i find thy power and thine alone can change the lepers spots and melt the heart of stone chorus jesus paid it all all to him i owe sin had left a crimson stain he washed it white as snow alt int snow verse 3 for nothing good have i whereby thy grace to claim ill wash my garments white in the blood of calvarys lamb chorus jesus paid it all all to him i owe sin had left a crimson stain he washed it white as snow alt int snow verse 4 and when before the throne i stand in him complete jesus died my soul to save my lips shall still repeat chorus jesus paid it all all to him i owe sin had left a crimson stain he washed it white as snow jesus paid it all all to him i owe sin had left a crimson stain he washed it white as snow

Verse 1: And I [B/D#]hear the Savior say, "Your [F#]strength indeed is [B]small, Child of [G#m7]weakness watch and [E2]pray, Find in [B]Me thine [F#]all in [B]all."

Verse 1: And I [B/D#]hear the Savior say, "Your [F#]strength indeed is [B]small, Child of [G#m7]weakness watch and [E2]pray, Find in [B]Me thine [F#]all in [B]all."
Chorus 1: Cause [B]Jesus paid it [G#m7]all, [B]All to Him I [F#]owe; [B]Sin had [B/D#]left a [E2]crimson stain, He [B]washed it [F#]white as [B]snow.

Verse 2: [B/D#]Lord now indeed I find, Thy [F#]power, and Thine [B]alone Can [G#m7]change the leper's [E2]spots, and [B]melt the [F#]heart of [B]stone.

[B]Sin had [B/D#]left a [E2]crimson stain, He [B]washed it [F#]white as [B]snow He [B]washed it [F#]white as [B]snow He [B]washed it [F#]white as [B]snow
Bridge: Oh [B]praise the One who [Bsus]paid my debt And [B]raised this life up [Bsus]from the dead
Oh [B]praise the One [B/D#]who [E2]paid my debt [B/D#]And [C#m7]raised this life [B/D#]up [E2]from the dead [B/D#]

Verse 3: And [B]when before the throne, I [F#]stand in Him [B]complete "Jesus [G#m7]died my soul to [E2]save," My [B]lips shall [F#]still rep[B]eat.
"Jesus [G#m7]died my soul to [E2]save," "Jesus [G#m7]died my soul to [E2]save," "Jesus [G#m7]died my soul to [E2]save," My [B]lips shall [F#]still rep[B]eat.

Verse 1: I [E]hear the Savior [A2]say, "Your [B]strength indeed is [E]small, Child of [E]weakness watch and [A]pray, Find in [E]Me your [B]all in [E]all."
Chorus: [E]Jesus paid it [A]all, [E]All to Him I [B]owe; [E]Sin had left a [A]crimson stain, He [E]washed it [B]white as [E]snow.
Verse 2: [E]Lord now indeed I [A]find, Thy [B]power, and Thine [E]alone Can [E]change the leper's [A]spots, and [E]melt the [B]heart of [E]stone.
Verse 3: And [E]when before the [A2]throne, I [B]stand in Him [E]complete "Jesus [E]died my soul to [A]save," My [E]lips shall [B]still rep[E]eat.
